title: pAdamE tuNai shiva
sahitya:
pAdamE tuNai shiva pAdamE tuNai


anupallavi

  Adi shaktiyin paramjyOti nAthanin


caraNam    kAmam veghuLi kalakka mAna kavalai nIngik-kaTTu vilagi]
nAma rasattaip-paghip-parughi namah shivAya Om haravene
nayandu nayandu navinru navinru bhayam teLiya nallabhayam aLikkum
